channel.title: EEMs on Philippe Massicotte
channel.description: Recent content in EEMs on Philippe Massicotte

item.title: eemR 1.0.0
item.author: pmassicotte@hotmail.com (Philippe Massicotte)
item.description: When eemR was originally created, I wrote few functions to import eems derived from the spectrofluorometers I knew. Given the high diversity in file formats, eemR now offers the possibility for the user to write his/her own import function. An example In this example, we will learn how to create a import function for a specific eem file generated by the software of a Cary Eclipse spectrofluorometer. First, lets have a look to the content of custom_cary.
